## DK Clinic Management System

This is a React TypeScript application for managing a private clinic with features for:

- Patient management (add, view, edit patient records)
- Doctor management (manage doctor profiles and specializations)
- Appointment booking and tracking
- Dashboard with overview statistics
- Responsive design with sidebar navigation

## Getting Started

1. Install Node.js (version 16 or higher)
2. Run `npm install` to install dependencies
3. Run `npm run dev` to start the development server
4. Open http://localhost:5173 in your browser

## Project Structure

- `src/components/` - Reusable UI components (Layout, Sidebar)
- `src/pages/` - Page components (Dashboard, Patients, Doctors, Appointments, BookAppointment)
- `src/App.tsx` - Main application with routing
- `src/main.tsx` - Application entry point

## Technologies Used

- React 18 with TypeScript
- Vite for build tooling
- React Router for navigation
- Custom CSS for styling
